shortdesc.ph: Specifies the audio track to play in the current audio file.
Specifies the audio track to play for the current audio file.
Specifies the audio track for the current audio file.
Specifies the audio track to play in the current audio file.

section.p: After obtaining the audio track index of the audio file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. If different tracks in a multi-track file contain songs in different languages, you can call this method to set the playback language.

After obtaining the audio track index of the audio file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. For example, if different tracks in a multi-track file store songs in different languages, you can call this method to set the playback language.

After obtaining the audio track index of the audio file, you can call this method to select any track for playback. If different tracks in a multi-track file contain songs in different languages, you can call this method to set the playback language.

After obtaining the audio track index of the audio file, you can call this method to specify any track for playback. If different tracks of a multi-track file contain songs in different languages, you can use this method to set the playback language.
section.note: You need to call this method after calling to obtain the audio stream index.
You need to call this method after calling to obtain the audio stream index.
You need to call this method after calling to get the audio stream index.
You need to call this method after calling to get the audio stream index.

plentry.pd: The index of the audio track.
The index of the audio track.
The index of the audio track.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Code](https://doc.shengwang.cn/api-ref/rtc/rn/error-code) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
